project_info.name: WebStrike Command (C&C Tiberian Dawn Clone)
project_info.completion_percentage: 100% Iteration 2 Complete - Starting Iteration 3 AI Systems

phase_0_context_integration.current_mission: Apply project-specific todos and resolve production emergency fixes
phase_0_context_integration.workflow_status: UnifiedWorkflow integrated - applying critical production fixes
phase_0_context_integration.user_impact: Complete gameplay failure - only test sprites visible, mouse interaction broken
phase_0_context_integration.technical_paradox: 64,809 FPS performance, healthy containers, but zero functional gameplay
immediate_fixes_required: ECS World cleanup method (TypeError: this.world.cleanup is not a function)
Missing RTS gameplay rendering (only green test sprites visible)
Mouse coordinate desync during viewport scrolling
phase_0_context_integration.validation_gap: Massive disconnect between technical validation success and user experience failure
phase_0_context_integration.priority_sequence: Fix ECS cleanup → Diagnose missing gameplay → Fix mouse coordinates → Validate user experience
phase_0_context_integration.workflow_context: Using enhanced UnifiedWorkflow with 52 agent specifications for comprehensive production fixes

todos.content: Setup complete project structure with proper folder hierarchy (src/, assets/, dist/, tests/)
Initialize package.json with all required dependencies (PixiJS, Colyseus, TensorFlow.js, Ollama WebSocket client)
Create unified-orchestration-config.yaml with WebStrike Command specific agent configuration
Initialize PixiJS renderer with WebGL context and basic camera system setup
Implement custom sprite batching system for optimal performance (target: 1000+ sprites batched)
Create camera system with smooth scrolling, zoom, and bounds checking
Setup texture atlas management system with lazy loading for game assets
todos.notes: Required for sprite variety and asset optimization. Currently using test sprites.

todos.content: Implement game loop with fixed timestep and interpolation for smooth gameplay
Establish performance baseline metrics (60+ FPS target, memory usage < 200MB)
Implement Entity-Component System (ECS) architecture for scalable game object management
todos.notes: COMPLETED: ECS architecture implemented with 9 component types and 5 system types. World, EntityFactory, and all core systems operational.

todos.content: Create HTML entry point with proper game canvas and UI container setup
Setup development environment with live-server and build process
Implement unit selection system with mouse interaction and visual feedback
todos.notes: COMPLETED: SelectionSystem implemented with box selection, hover feedback, and visual indicators. Full mouse interaction support.

todos.content: Create A* pathfinding algorithm with binary heap optimization for individual units
todos.notes: COMPLETED: A* pathfinding system implemented with NavigationGrid, AStar algorithm, performance optimization, spatial partitioning, and debug visualization.

todos.content: Add flow field generation system for efficient group movement coordination
Implement fog of war system using grid-based reference counting for performance
Create resource gathering mechanics for Tiberium (25 credits per bail, 700 credit harvester capacity)
Build complete economy system with credits, build costs, and refund mechanics (50% refund rate)
Implement building construction system with placement validation and build queues
Add collision detection system with quadtree spatial indexing for performance
Integrate TensorFlow.js for GPU-accelerated machine learning in browsers
Implement Q-learning algorithm with experience replay buffer for unit learning (target: convergence < 1000 episodes)
Create behavior trees for individual unit decision-making and autonomy
Setup Ollama WebSocket integration for strategic AI assistance (target: < 500ms response time)
Implement GOAP (Goal-Oriented Action Planning) system for flexible AI behavior
Add influence maps for strategic positioning and threat assessment
Create AI opponent personalities with different strategic approaches
Setup learning convergence metrics and AI performance tracking
Setup Colyseus server infrastructure for multiplayer room management
Implement WebRTC data channels for low-latency peer-to-peer communication
Create state synchronization system with delta compression for bandwidth optimization
Add client-side prediction for responsive multiplayer controls
Setup STUN/TURN servers for NAT traversal (Coturn or Xirsys)
Create lobby system and matchmaking functionality for multiplayer games
Add anti-cheat measures including server validation, rate limiting, and replay detection
Comprehensive performance profiling and optimization (quadtrees, object pooling)
Add visual effects and particle systems for explosions, projectiles, and environmental effects
Implement replay system for recorded gameplay sessions
Create production deployment pipeline with blue-green deployment strategy
Setup monitoring with Prometheus/Grafana for production health tracking
Add CDN configuration for global asset distribution and optimization
Create comprehensive user documentation and guides
Setup blue-green deployment system with automated rollback capabilities
Implement intelligent building planning system where users can plan building locations even without sufficient resources - buildings are constructed automatically when resources become available
todos.notes: Shows concrete sprite placeholder at planned location, includes drag-drop priority queue

todos.content: Create drag-and-drop building construction queue UI where users can reorder build priority even after planning
todos.notes: Priority queue visualization with drag-drop reordering capability

todos.content: Implement radius-based building placement system - more expensive buildings provide wider construction radius for adjacent structures
todos.notes: If any part of planned building overlaps with radius, construction is allowed

todos.content: Display ghost/transparent versions of all planned buildings when placing new structures to show future base layout
todos.notes: Semi-transparent overlay showing all planned but unbuilt structures

todos.content: Implement intelligent unit production planning system with drag-drop queue management similar to building system
todos.notes: Queue units even without resources, auto-produce when resources available

todos.content: Add concrete foundation sprites that appear at planned building locations to visually indicate future construction sites
todos.notes: Visual feedback showing exact planned building footprint with concrete texture

todos.content: Implement loose command system allowing units to be given high-level behavioral goals rather than specific orders
todos.notes: Phase 8 - Units interpret commands as ML goals with reward functions

todos.content: Guard Perimeter: Units patrol the perimeter of nearest structure group, defending against threats
todos.notes: ML reward: successful perimeter defense, threat elimination

todos.content: Guard Specific: Protect designated unit/building, attack any threats to that target
todos.notes: ML reward: target survival, threat neutralization

todos.content: Patrol Commands: Standard patrol around structures and resource-specific patrol patterns
todos.notes: ML reward: area coverage, threat detection, resource protection

todos.content: Explore: Prioritize survival while maximizing map discovery and fog-of-war reveal
todos.notes: ML reward: new tiles discovered, survival time, intel gathered

todos.content: Attack: Seek and destroy nearest discovered enemy units or structures
todos.notes: ML reward: enemy units destroyed, damage dealt, objectives completed

todos.content: Loiter: Intelligently find positions that avoid blocking other units' paths
todos.notes: ML reward: minimized path obstruction, optimal positioning

todos.content: Ambush: Position at enemy movement chokepoints and attack passing units
todos.notes: ML reward: successful ambushes, damage from concealment

todos.content: Guerrilla: Hit-and-run tactics - attack when safe, retreat when threatened
todos.notes: ML reward: damage dealt vs damage taken ratio, survival with kills

todos.content: Ambush/Guerrilla Hybrid: Combine ambush positioning with guerrilla retreat tactics
todos.notes: ML reward: ambush success + relocation efficiency + survival

todos.content: Retreat: Prioritize survival and withdrawal to safe locations
todos.notes: ML reward: survival duration, distance from threats, health preservation

todos.content: Implement aggression vs survival slider system to bias ML reward functions per unit
todos.notes: Meta-parameter that adjusts all reward functions: aggressive units prioritize damage, cautious units prioritize survival

todos.content: Create ML goal-to-reward mapping system where each command type defines specific reward criteria
todos.notes: Dynamic reward function assignment based on active command mode

todos.content: Discover Resources: Specialized exploration prioritizing resource discovery over map tiles
todos.notes: ML reward: resource patches found, Tiberium fields discovered, strategic value of findings

todos.content: Discover Enemies: Scout mode prioritizing enemy structure and unit detection
todos.notes: ML reward: enemy units spotted, structures identified, base locations revealed, intel value

todos.content: Attack Supply Line: Target enemy resource collection infrastructure while avoiding direct combat
todos.notes: ML reward: harvesters destroyed, refineries damaged, resource denial time, minimal unit losses

todos.content: Siege: Establish containment positions around enemy bases to restrict movement and expansion
todos.notes: ML reward: enemy movement blocked, expansion prevented, area control maintained, siege duration

todos.content: Create Discover mode framework as intelligent adaptation of Explore with target-specific rewards
todos.notes: Base framework where discoveries are weighted higher than raw tile exploration

todos.content: Phase 9: Implement ML-driven intelligent map generation system that expands playable area during extended gameplay
todos.notes: Phase 9 - Maps expand after 1 hour of gameplay, then progressively longer intervals

todos.content: Train ML model on existing map patterns to ensure seamless, coherent map expansions
todos.notes: Model learns terrain transitions, resource distribution, chokepoint patterns from existing maps

todos.content: Implement progressive timing system where expansion intervals increase with map size
todos.notes: 1st expansion: 1hr, 2nd: 1.5hrs, 3rd: 2.25hrs, etc. Exponential growth matching tile count

todos.content: Create edge detection system to identify optimal expansion boundaries and connection points
todos.notes: Identifies natural expansion points: terrain edges, resource boundaries, strategic corridors

todos.content: Implement terrain pattern recognition to maintain geographical consistency in expansions
todos.notes: ML recognizes: mountain ranges, river systems, desert/tundra regions, maintains continuity

todos.content: ML algorithm for balanced resource distribution in new map sections
todos.notes: Ensures fair Tiberium distribution, strategic resource placement, prevents resource starvation

todos.content: Generate strategic features (chokepoints, high ground, defensive positions) in expansions
todos.notes: Creates interesting tactical terrain: bridges, passes, plateaus, resource clusters

todos.content: Create UI notification system for map expansions with fog-of-war reveal animations
todos.notes: Alert players to new territories, dramatic fog reveal, minimap update animation

todos.content: Implement dynamic memory management and rendering optimization for growing maps
todos.notes: LOD system for distant tiles, chunk-based loading, viewport culling for massive maps

todos.content: Create mathematical formula for expansion timing and size based on gameplay duration
todos.notes: Formula: next_expansion_time = base_time * (1.5^expansion_count), tiles_added = base_tiles * (1.3^expansion_count)

todos.content: Phase 10: Implement multiple browser windows support allowing users to have multiple views focused on different map locations for better strategic overview
todos.notes: Phase 10 feature - Each window maintains independent camera position and viewport. Windows sync game state but have independent view controls. Useful for monitoring base while commanding units elsewhere, or watching multiple battle fronts simultaneously.

todos.content: PRODUCTION CRITICAL: Fix ECS World cleanup method missing - 'this.world.cleanup is not a function' error breaking game shutdown
todos.notes: IMMEDIATE FIX REQUIRED: World class has destroy() and clear() methods but main game calls this.world.cleanup() causing TypeError. User reports multiple cleanup errors.

todos.content: PRODUCTION CRITICAL: Missing RTS gameplay mechanics - only test sprites visible, no functional game content for users
todos.notes: CRITICAL GAP: Health checks pass, performance excellent (64,809 FPS), but users see only 'green spinning squares' - no actual RTS gameplay visible. Massive disconnect between technical validation and user experience.

todos.content: PRODUCTION CRITICAL: Mouse coordinate desync after viewport scrolling - selection box appears in wrong location breaking user interaction
todos.notes: BLOCKING USER INTERACTION: Camera.screenToWorld() coordinate conversion not accounting for viewport position changes during scrolling. SelectionSystem mouse events create selection boxes at incorrect world coordinates.

todos.content: PRODUCTION ANALYSIS: Investigate massive gap between technical metrics and functional reality
todos.notes: VALIDATION FAILURE: System reports 'production-validated', excellent performance, healthy containers, but actual user experience is completely broken. Need comprehensive audit of validation vs reality.

todos.content: PRODUCTION DIAGNOSIS: Determine if game systems initialize but fail to render, or fail to initialize entirely
todos.notes: ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS: Need to determine whether ECS entities/systems initialize successfully but rendering pipeline fails, or if entity creation itself is broken. Critical for choosing fix strategy.

iteration_1.name: Foundation (Weeks 1-4)
iteration_1.status: COMPLETED - Foundation fully operational with ECS

phase_8_features.ml_integration: Each command maps to specific reward functions for Q-learning
phase_8_features.meta_parameters: Aggression vs Survival slider per unit
phase_8_features.behavior_goals: Commands as high-level goals, not specific orders
phase_8_features.economic_warfare: Attack Supply Line targets resource infrastructure
phase_8_features.area_denial: Siege mode for containment and movement restriction

phase_9_features.core_concept: Infinite map expansion during extended gameplay sessions
ml_components: Terrain continuity learning from existing maps
technical_features: Dynamic memory management for growing maps
phase_9_features.gameplay_impact: Prevents stalemates, creates new opportunities, rewards long-term play

phase_10_features.multi_window_support: Allow multiple browser windows with independent viewports
phase_10_features.technical_implementation: Independent camera systems per window, shared game state synchronization

production_emergency.notes: Despite 'production-validated' status, core functionality completely broken for users

immediate_critical_fixes.fix_complexity: Simple - add cleanup() method alias to World.destroy()
Complex - investigate entity creation vs rendering pipeline
immediate_critical_fixes.user_impact: Complete gameplay failure - no functional content visible
Broken user interaction - selection boxes appear in wrong locations

validation_gap_analysis.technical_metrics: Excellent - 64,809 FPS, healthy containers, responsive health checks
validation_gap_analysis.user_experience: Complete failure - no gameplay visible, interaction broken
validation_gap_analysis.root_cause: Validation focused on technical metrics, ignored functional gameplay testing

emergency_sequence.phase_5: Update validation procedures to prevent recurrence
